meta.title: QuestSagaOnline.com - Friday Night Funkin
meta.description: Dive into crazy rhythms and extraordinary duels. Press arrows in time with the beats to hit every note and stay in rhythm!
meta.keywords: Friday Night Funkin, rhythm game, music game, dance game, battle, music

hero.title: Friday Night Funkin
hero.description: Dive into crazy rhythms and extraordinary duels. Press arrows in time with the beats to hit every note and stay in rhythm! Compete with all kinds of funky enemies.

game.title: Play Friday Night Funkin
game.description: Click the button below to start the game

playGame.title: Play Now
playGame.description: Dive into the world of musical duels right now!

howToPlay.title: How to Play
howToPlay.description: Master the basics and become a musical warrior in a few steps

steps.title: Use Arrow Keys
steps.description: Press up, down, left, and right arrows in accordance with the falling notes

steps.title: Keep the Rhythm
steps.description: Synchronize your presses with the music beat to get more points

steps.title: Combo Hits
steps.description: Correctly press multiple notes in a row to create combos and bonus points

steps.title: Avoid Mistakes
steps.description: Each mistake reduces your score and may lead to losing the duel

steps.title: Practice
steps.description: Play different songs and difficulties to improve your skills

reviews.title: Player Reviews
reviews.description: What our players say about the game

reviews.comment: Best rhythm game I've ever played! The music is absolutely incredible.
Excellent game for training reaction and musical ear. Very exciting!
Cool game with original style. Graphics and music are top notch!

news.title: Latest News
news.description: Stay up to date with the latest events and announcements

articles.title: New Songs Added to QuestSagaOnline.com
articles.excerpt: Added 5 new exciting songs with different difficulties for all players
articles.content: We're excited to announce that 5 new songs have been added to QuestSagaOnline.com! These songs include various genres from pop to rock, and each has unique visual effects and difficulty. New songs are available for all players for free.

articles.title: Game Interface Update
articles.excerpt: Improved user interface with new animations and effects
articles.content: We've updated the QuestSagaOnline.com interface, adding new animations, improved visual effects, and more intuitive controls. The game now looks even more modern and attractive.

articles.title: 2025 Season Tournament
articles.excerpt: Announced a major tournament with prizes for the best players
articles.content: The big QuestSagaOnline.com 2025 tournament is starting! Compete with players from around the world and win valuable prizes. The tournament will last 2 weeks and include various difficulty categories.

articles.title: Mobile Version Coming Soon
articles.excerpt: QuestSagaOnline.com will be available on mobile devices in Q2 2025
articles.content: Great news for mobile gamers! We're working hard to bring QuestSagaOnline.com to your smartphones and tablets. The mobile version will feature touch controls optimized for smaller screens, offline mode for practice, and cross-platform progress sync. Expected release date: Q2 2025.

articles.title: Community Challenges Launched
articles.excerpt: New weekly challenges with leaderboards and rewards
articles.content: We've launched a new Community Challenges feature! Every week, players can participate in themed challenges with special song selections and unique scoring rules. Top performers will be featured on our leaderboards and receive exclusive in-game rewards. Join the community and show off your rhythm skills!

articles.title: Partnership with Music Artists
articles.excerpt: Exclusive tracks from popular artists coming to QuestSagaOnline.com
articles.content: We're excited to announce partnerships with several popular music artists! Soon, QuestSagaOnline.com will feature exclusive tracks and remixes from well-known musicians. These special songs will be available for a limited time and include unique visual effects and animations. Stay tuned for more details about our upcoming artist collaborations!

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions or suggestions? Write to us!

form.success: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.
form.error: Sorry, an error occurred while sending the message. Please try again.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.description: Important information about using our website and game

blocks.title: Terms of Use
blocks.content: By using our website and playing Friday Night Funkin, you agree to the following terms. The game is intended for entertainment and does not contain content that may harm children or teenagers.

blocks.title: Age Restrictions
blocks.content: Friday Night Funkin is intended for players aged 7 and older. Younger children should play under adult supervision.

blocks.title: Liability
blocks.content: We are not responsible for any damages that may arise from using our website or game. Play responsibly and don't forget to take breaks.

blocks.title: Technical Requirements
blocks.content: For comfortable gameplay, you need a modern web browser with HTML5 support. A stable internet connection is recommended for loading the game.

blocks.title: Privacy
blocks.content: We collect minimal data necessary for the website to function. Your privacy is important to us. See our Privacy Policy for detailed information.

blocks.title: Changes to Terms
blocks.content: We reserve the right to change these terms at any time. Changes take effect from the moment they are published on the website.

cookieBar.message: We use cookies to improve your experience on our website.
